title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot (simonjcarr/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; sync/async, POJO mapping, Spring starter.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose (rumblecraft/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks (CPU/GPU, Open-WebUI, Postgres, etc.).

title: ollama-chatbot (jacksparrow42/ollama-chatbot)
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama backend via streaming fetch.

title: ollama-cookbook (ollama-cookbook/ollama-cookbook)
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, etc.

title: ollama-obsidian (joeyfez/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization & Q&A on your vault via Ollama.

title: ollama-nvim (nomnivore/ollama-nvim)
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation, explanation, and chat using Ollama models.

title: ollama-telegram (deedy5/ollama-telegram)
summary: Telegram bot that proxies chats to Ollama with group whitelist, session memory.

title: ollama-model-hub (barbarossus/ollama-model-hub)
summary: Unofficial registry browser to search, filter, and one-click import community GGUF models.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-slack-bot (alexander-turner/ollama-slack-bot)
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for local LLM queries with channel memory.

title: ollama-django (marcus-z/ollama-django)
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama chat & embed endpoints plus admin UI for model control.
